Sheet.header: Tips for using this report
Sheet.Step: !! Important !! First save this new report (CTRL+S).
Tip 1 - to search for a value across all sheets, first right-mouse click a tab and Select All Sheets, then choose Edit, Find from the standard menu.
Tip 2 - to open Cases directly, select an IRN and run macro CasesByIRN (shortcut CTRL+SHIFT+C).
Note - the macro CaseByIRN depends on cell AA2 containing the case program with appropriate parameters (eg CASE -nCASEENQ).
Note - cell AA2 may be populated differently when the workbook is created if site control "CPA QR Case Application" is present with the Application Name to launch (eg. Renewals).

Query.SQL: select case when max(PROGRAMNAME) is null then 'CASE -nCASEENQ' else (select isnull(PROGRAMPATH,'') + isnull(PROGRAMNAME,'') + ' ' + isnull(RUNTIMEPARMS,'') from APPLICATIONS where APPLICATIONNAME = (select COLCHARACTER from SITECONTROL where CONTROLID = 'CPA QR Case Application')) end as ' ' from APPLICATIONS where APPLICATIONNAME = (select COLCHARACTER from SITECONTROL where CONTROLID = 'CPA QR Case Application')

Sheet.Query: select count(0) as 'Total CPA Portfolio' from CPAPORTFOLIO

select case when MATCHTYPE ='IRN' then 'Direct match CASECODE (IRN-I)' when MATCHTYPE ='Number' then 'Official number (PROPOSEDIRN-N)' when MATCHTYPE ='Obsolete' then 'Obsolete match' else 'No match' end as 'Matching', case when MATCHTYPE ='IRN' then 1 when MATCHTYPE ='Number' then 2 when MATCHTYPE ='Obsolete' then 3 else 4 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 1', case when MATCHTYPE is null then ( case when ((Responsibility='Client responsible') and (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') )then 'CPA Live and Client responsible' when ((Responsibility='Agent responsible') and (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') )then 'CPA Live and Agent responsible' when (((Responsibility <>'Client responsible') and (Responsibility<>'Agent responsible') ) or (CPAStatus <>'Live at CPA')) then 'Dead/other - see Portfolio Only' end ) when MATCHTYPE = 'Obsolete' then '' else 'See Match Breakdown' end as 'Status', count ( distinct PORTFOLIONO) as 'Cases on CPA Portfolio' from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO CPA group by case when MATCHTYPE ='IRN' then 'Direct match CASECODE (IRN-I)' when MATCHTYPE ='Number' then 'Official number (PROPOSEDIRN-N)' when MATCHTYPE ='Obsolete' then 'Obsolete match' else 'No match' end, case when MATCHTYPE ='IRN' then 1 when MATCHTYPE ='Number' then 2 when MATCHTYPE ='Obsolete' then 3 else 4 end, case when MATCHTYPE is null then ( case when ((Responsibility='Client responsible') and (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') )then 'CPA Live and Client responsible' when ((Responsibility='Agent responsible') and (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') )then 'CPA Live and Agent responsible' when (((Responsibility <>'Client responsible') and (Responsibility<>'Agent responsible') ) or (CPAStatus <>'Live at CPA')) then 'Dead/other - see Portfolio Only' end ) when MATCHTYPE = 'Obsolete' then '' else 'See Match Breakdown' end order by 2 desc, 3
select count (distinct C.IRN) as 'Inprotech Only - flagged cases' from CASES C left join CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO CPA on CPA.CASEID = C.CASEID where REPORTTOTHIRDPARTY = 1 and CPA.CASEID is null

select case (isnull(S.LIVEFLAG,1)) when 0 then 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' else ( case (isnull(SR.LIVEFLAG,1)) when 0 then 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' else (case (isnull(IO.INSTRUCTIONSENDFLAG,0)) when 0 then 'Live (Inhibited)' else (case when C.STOPPAYREASON is not null then 'Live (Inhibited)' else 'Live for sending' end ) end ) end ) end as 'Inprotech status', count (distinct C.CASEID) as 'Inprotech Only - flagged cases' from CASES C left join CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO MP on MP.CASEID = C.CASEID left join CPASTAR_LIVEINPROTECHONLY IO on IO.CASEID = C.CASEID left join PROPERTYTYPE T on (T.PROPERTYTYPE = C.PROPERTYTYPE) left join STATUS S on (S.STATUSCODE = C.STATUSCODE) left join PROPERTY P on (P.CASEID=C.CASEID) left join STATUS SR on (SR.STATUSCODE=P.RENEWALSTATUS) where C.REPORTTOTHIRDPARTY = 1 and MP.CASEID is null -- only non-matched cases group by case (isnull(S.LIVEFLAG,1)) when 0 then 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' else ( case (isnull(SR.LIVEFLAG,1)) when 0 then 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' else (case (isnull(IO.INSTRUCTIONSENDFLAG,0)) when 0 then 'Live (Inhibited)' else (case when C.STOPPAYREASON is not null then 'Live (Inhibited)' else 'Live for sending' end ) end ) end ) end order by 1 desc, 2 desc

select (select count(distinct IRN) from CPASTAR_LIVEINPROTECHONLY where (isnull(INSTRUCTIONSENDFLAG,0) = 1) and STOPPAYREASON is null) as 'Estimate', cast ((select count(1) from CPAPORTFOLIO)/100 as dec(6,0)) as 'Goal', 'New cases? Investigate if more than 1% of total portfolio. See Inprotech Only.'

select count(distinct MP.CASEID) as 'Estimate', sum(case when (StartPayDate >= getdate() - 90) then 1 else 0 end) as 'Goal', 'Investigate start date - cases to reactivate? Start date must be less than 6 months old at time of processing.' from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO MP left join CPAPORTFOLIO CPALIVE on (CPALIVE.CASEID = MP.CASEID and CPALIVE.STATUSINDICATOR = 'L') where MP.CASEID is not null and MP.MATCHTYPE <> 'Obsolete' and MP.StartPayDate >= convert( datetime, convert(varchar(4),year(getdate()))+'01'+'01',112) and MP.CPAStatus <> 'Live at CPA' and MP.InprotechLiveFlag = 'Live on Inprotech' and MP.InprotechSendFlag = 'Flagged' and CPALIVE.CASEID is null -- ie where there isn't a live one

select (select count(distinct CASEID) from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO where PROPOSEDIRN is not null and CPAStatus <> 'Transferred' and InprotechLiveFlag = 'Live on Inprotech' and InprotechSendFlag = 'Flagged') as 'Estimate', 0 as 'Goal', 'Update case code - appear new but match found by official number (PROPOSEDIRN-N).'

select (select count(distinct CASEID) from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO where PROPOSEDIRN is not null and CPAStatus = 'Transferred' and InprotechLiveFlag = 'Live on Inprotech' and InprotechSendFlag = 'Flagged') as 'Estimate', 0 as 'Goal', 'Investigate and stop reporting - appear new but match found by official number (PROPOSEDIRN-N) AND Transferred.'

SELECT count(distinct MP.CASEID) as 'Estimate', 0 as 'Goal', case when (MP.Responsibility = 'Agent responsible' ) then '(Agent responsible) investigate stop reason - these cases may auto-abandon - remove stop reason or manually instruct.' else '(Client responsible) investigate stop reason - these cases may auto-abandon - remove stop reason or manually instruct.' end from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO MP left join CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO MPL on (MP.CASEID = MPL.CASEID and MP.IPRURN <> MPL.IPRURN) where MP.CASEID is not null and MPL.CASEID is null and MP.MATCHTYPE <> 'Obsolete' and MP.StopPayReason is not null and MP.CPAStatus = 'Live at CPA' group by MP.Responsibility order by MP.Responsibility

SELECT PropertyType, case when (PropertyType = 'Patents') then 1 when (PropertyType = 'Trademarks') then 2 when (PropertyType = 'Designs') then 3 else 4 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 1', Responsibility, CPAStatus, case when (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') then 1 when (CPAStatus='Dead at CPA') then 2 when (CPAStatus='Transferred') then 3 else 4 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 2', InprotechLiveFlag, case when InprotechLiveFlag = 'Live on Inprotech' then 1 else 2 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 3', case when InprotechLiveFlag <> 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' then InprotechSendFlag else 'N/A' end as InprotechSendFlag, COUNT(DISTINCT PORTFOLIONO) as 'Total' from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO C where CASEID is not null and MATCHTYPE <> 'Obsolete' group by PropertyType, case when (PropertyType = 'Patents') then 1 when (PropertyType = 'Trademarks') then 2 when (PropertyType = 'Designs') then 3 else 4 end, Responsibility, CPAStatus, case when (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') then 1 when (CPAStatus='Dead at CPA') then 2 when (CPAStatus='Transferred') then 3 else 4 end, InprotechLiveFlag, case when InprotechLiveFlag = 'Live on Inprotech' then 1 else 2 end, case when InprotechLiveFlag <> 'Dead(or Dead Renewal)' then InprotechSendFlag else 'N/A' end order by 2,3,5,7,8
Select COLBOOLEAN from SITECONTROL where upper(CONTROLID) ='CPA-USE CLIENTCASECODE'

SELECT PropertyType, case when (PropertyType = 'Patents') then 1 when (PropertyType = 'Trademarks') then 2 when (PropertyType = 'Designs') then 3 else 4 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 1', Responsibility , CPAStatus, case when (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') then 1 when (CPAStatus='Dead at CPA') then 2 when (CPAStatus='Transferred') then 3 else 4 end as 'Discardable Sort Column 2', COUNT(DISTINCT PORTFOLIONO) as 'Total' from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO C where CASEID is null group by PropertyType, case when (PropertyType = 'Patents') then 1 when (PropertyType = 'Trademarks') then 2 when (PropertyType = 'Designs') then 3 else 4 end , Responsibility , CPAStatus, case when (CPAStatus ='Live at CPA') then 1 when (CPAStatus='Dead at CPA') then 2 when (CPAStatus='Transferred') then 3 else 4 end order by 2,3,5
Select COLBOOLEAN from SITECONTROL where upper(CONTROLID) ='CPA-USE CLIENTCASECODE'

Sheet.header: Inprotech Only - live cases flagged to send
Sheet.Query: select V.* from CPASTAR_LIVEINPROTECHONLY V where INSTRUCTIONSENDFLAG =1 and StopPayReason is null order by V.CASEID, V.IRN

Sheet.header: Inhibited Inprotech Only - live cases flagged but Standing Instruction or Stop Pay Reason will inhibit
Sheet.Query: select V.* from CPASTAR_LIVEINPROTECHONLY V where (isnull(INSTRUCTIONSENDFLAG,0)=0 or StopPayReason is not null) order by V.CASEID, V.IRN

Sheet.header: Patents, Agent responsible, Live at CPA - No Match
Sheet.Query: select PropertyType, Responsibility, CPAStatus, CPAEventStatus, CASECODE, CPATypeCode, CPATypeName, CPACountryCode, CPAApplicationNo, CPARegistrationNo, CPAApplicationDate, CPAGrantDate, CPAProprietor, CPAAccount, CPAClientRef, PORTFOLIONO, IPRURN from CPASTAR_MATCHEDPORTFOLIO where PropertyType = 'Patents' and Responsibility = 'Agent responsible' and CPAStatus = 'Live at CPA' and MATCHTYPE is null order by CASECODE desc

Sub QuickPrepare() 'Add report-specific formatting macro instructions here:
Dim nRows, nColumn, nSheet, nSheets As Integer 'Now loop through sheets and remove Discardable columns (had to wait for data) For nSheet = 3 To 4 Sheets(nSheet).Activate nColumn = 1 Do Until Len(Cells(2, nColumn)) = 0 If Left(Cells(2, nColumn), 11) = "Discardable" Then Columns(nColumn).Delete Shift:=xlToLeft 'no need to increment if deleting Else nColumn = nColumn + 1 End If Loop Next nSheet 'Hard coded colouring-in: 'First the totals sheet Sheets("Totals").Select 'Remove discardable sort column Range("C6:C12").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlToLeft 'Resize columns Columns("A:A").ColumnWidth = 10.57 Columns("B:B").ColumnWidth = 30 Columns("C:C").ColumnWidth = 28 Columns("D:D").ColumnWidth = 35 Columns("E:E").ColumnWidth = 6 Columns("F:F").ColumnWidth = 4.86 'Colour the sections Rows("3:15").Select Selection.Interior.ColorIndex = 35 Rows("16:23").Select Selection.Interior.ColorIndex = 34 Rows("24:39").Select Selection.Interior.ColorIndex = 36 'Adjust the CPA summary section If Range("C7").Value <> "CPA Live and Agent responsible" Then 'Move the rows down Range("B7:D11").Select Selection.Copy Range("B8").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("B7:D7").Select Selection.ClearContents End If If Range("C8").Value <> "CPA Live and Client responsible" Then 'Move the rows down Range("B8:D11").Select Selection.Copy Range("B9").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("B8:D8").Select Selection.ClearContents End If If Range("C9").Value <> "Dead/other - see Portfolio Only" Then 'Move the rows down Range("B9:D11").Select Selection.Copy Range("B10").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("B9:D9").Select Selection.ClearContents End If If Range("B10").Value <> "Obsolete match" Then 'Move the rows down Range("B10:D11").Select Selection.Copy Range("B11").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("B10:D10").Select Selection.ClearContents End If If Range("B11").Value <> "Official number (PROPOSEDIRN-N)" Then 'Move the rows down Range("B11:D11").Select Selection.Copy Range("B12").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("B11:D11").Select Selection.ClearContents End If 'Adjust the Inprotech Only section If Range("C19").Value <> "Live for sending" Then 'Move the rows down Range("C19:D20").Select Selection.Copy Range("C20").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("C19:D19").Select Selection.ClearContents End If If Range("C20").Value <> "Live (Inhibited)" Then 'Move the rows down Range("C20:D20").Select Selection.Copy Range("C21").Select ActiveSheet.Paste Range("C20:D20").Select Selection.ClearContents End If 'Prepare Batch section Range("A24").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Batch" Range("B25").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Current estimate" Range("C25").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Goal" Range("D26").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Maximum batch size" ' Remove query headings Rows("28:28").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlUp Rows("29:29").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlUp Rows("30:30").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlUp Rows("31:31").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlUp Rows("32:32").Select Selection.Delete Shift:=xlUp 'Sum batch results Range("B26").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=SUM(R[2]C:R[7]C)" Range("C26").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=SUM(R[2]C:R[7]C)" 'Sum for crosscheck Range("D13").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=SUM(R[-6]C:R[-1]C)" Range("D13").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 15 Range("D22").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=SUM(R[-3]C:R[-1]C)" Range("D22").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 15 'Cross check totals Range("F22").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=R[-5]C[-5]-RC[-2]" Range("F22").Select Selection.NumberFormat = "_(* #,##0_);_(* (#,##0);_(* ""-""_);_(@_)" Range("F23").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=R[5]C[-4]-R[-4]C[-2]" Range("F23").Select Selection.NumberFormat = "_(* #,##0_);_(* (#,##0);_(* ""-""_);_(@_)" Range("F13").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=R[-9]C[-5]-RC[-2]" Range("F13").Select Selection.NumberFormat = "_(* #,##0_);_(* (#,##0);_(* ""-""_);_(@_)" Range("F14").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=(R[-7]C[-2] + R[-6]C[-2] + R[-5]C[-2])- SUM('Portfolio Only'!C[-2])" Range("F14").Select Selection.NumberFormat = "_(* #,##0_);_(* (#,##0);_(* ""-""_);_(@_)" Range("F15").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "=(R[-4]C[-2]+R[-3]C[-2])-SUM('Match Breakdown'!C)" Range("F15").Select Selection.NumberFormat = "_(* #,##0_);_(* (#,##0);_(* ""-""_);_(@_)" 'Checks Range("G13").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "zero check" Range("G14").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "zero check - portfolio only" Range("G15").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "zero check - match breakdown" Range("G22").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "zero check" Range("G23").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "zero check - new cases" 'Highlight key aspects Range("D7").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 3 Range("D8").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 3 Range("D19").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 3 Range("B26").Select Selection.Font.ColorIndex = 3 Range("A24").Select Selection.Font.Bold = True Range("B25:C25").Select Selection.Font.Bold = True Range("B26:C26").Select Selection.Font.Bold = True Range("D26").Select Selection.Font.Bold = True If Range("D7").Value <> "" Then Range("E7").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Investigate - add to Inprotech or remove from CPA?" End If If Range("D8").Value <> "" Then Range("E8").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Investigate - add to Inprotech or remove from CPA?" End If If Range("C20").Value <> "" Then Range("E20").Select ActiveCell.FormulaR1C1 = "Investigate - report to CPA flag should be off?" End If Range("B25:C25").Select With Selection .HorizontalAlignment = xlRight .VerticalAlignment = xlBottom .WrapText = False .Orientation = 0 .AddIndent = False .ShrinkToFit = False .MergeCells = False End With Range("D6").Select With Selection .HorizontalAlignment = xlRight .VerticalAlignment = xlBottom .WrapText = False .Orientation = 0 .AddIndent = False .ShrinkToFit = False .MergeCells = False End With Range("D18").Select With Selection .HorizontalAlignment = xlRight .VerticalAlignment = xlBottom .WrapText = False .Orientation = 0 .AddIndent = False .ShrinkToFit = False .MergeCells = False End With 'Frame results Range("B6:D12").Select Selection.borders(xlDiagonalDown).LineStyle = xlNone Selection.borders(xlDiagonalUp).LineStyle = xlNone With Selection.borders(xlEdgeLeft) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlEdgeTop) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlEdgeBottom) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlEdgeRight) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlInsideVertical) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlInsideHorizontal) .LineStyle = .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.borders(xlInsideVertical) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.Borders(xlInsideHorizontal) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With Range("B28:C33").Select xlAutomatic End With With Selection.Borders(xlEdgeTop) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.Borders(xlEdgeBottom) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With Selection.Borders(xlEdgeRight) .LineStyle = xlContinuous .Weight = xlThin .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With With .ColorIndex = xlAutomatic End With Range("A1").Select 'Now the match breakdown Sheets("Match Breakdown").Select Dim nRow, nColumnOutput As Integer Dim nStore, nStore1, nStore2, nStore3, nStore4, nStore5 As Integer Dim sValue, sDetailSheet As String Dim nColour, nFontColour As Integer nColumnOutput = 7 ActiveSheet.Cells(2, nColumnOutput).Font.Bold = True ActiveSheet.Cells(2, nColumnOutput).Value = "Detail sheet" ActiveSheet.Cells(2, nColumnOutput + 1).Font.Bold = True ActiveSheet.Cells(2, nColumnOutput + 1).Value = "Research required" For nRow = 3 To ActiveSheet.UsedRange.Rows.Count ' Test the variable "result" Select Case Cells(nRow, 1).Value Case "Patents" nStore1 = 1 Case "Trademarks" nStore1 = 2 Case "Designs" nStore1 = 3 Case Else nStore1 = 0 End Select Select Case Cells(nRow, 2).Value Case "Agent responsible" nStore2 = 10 Case "Client responsible" nStore2 = 20 Case Else nStore2 = 0 End Select Select Case Cells(nRow, 3).Value Case "Live at CPA" nStore3 = 100 Case "Dead at CPA" nStore3 = 200 Case "Transferred" nStore3 = 300 Case "N/A" nStore3 = 400 Case Else nStore3 = 0 End Select Select Case Cells(nRow, 4).Value Case "Live on Inprotech" nStore4 = 1000 Case "Dead(or Dead Renewal)" nStore4 = 2000 Case Else nStore4 = 0 End Select Select Case Cells(nRow, 5).Value Case "Flagged" nStore5 = 10000 Case "Not flagged" nStore5 = 20000 Case "N/A" nStore5 = 30000 Case Else nStore5 = 0 End Select nStore = nStore1 + nStore2 + nStore3 + nStore4 + nStore5 sValue = "Synchronised" nColour = 35 nFontColour = 1 sDetailSheet = "Other" Select Case Dim saDeleteSheet() As String 'declares the array variable with the necessary size ReDim saDeleteSheet(1 To nSheets) For nSheet = 7 To nSheets 'Start after breakdown sheets Sheets(nSheet).Activate 'Check for data If Range("A3").Value = "" Then 'Preserve name for later deletion by name saDeleteSheet(nSheet) = ActiveSheet.Name End If Next nSheet Application.DisplayAlerts = False For nSheet = 7 To nSheets If saDeleteSheet(nSheet) <> "" Then Sheets(saDeleteSheet(nSheet)).Delete End If Next nSheet 'Clean up Erase saDeleteSheet() ' free some memory Application.DisplayAlerts = True
End Sub

Sub CaseByIRN() 'Details from the application name in Site Control "CPA QR Case Application" If Range("Tips!AA2").Value = "" Then End End If On Error Resume Next Shell Range("Tips!AA2").Value & " -IRN" & Selection.Value, 1 End Sub
